DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare the plasma pharmacokinetics of a single 125mg oral dose of palbociclib in the presence and absence of rifampin-mediated enzyme induction in a fixed-sequence two-period study.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Drug-Drug Interaction Potential Of Rifampin OnThe Investigational Agent Palbociclib (PD-0332991)
DOC.criteria: Healthy males or females of nonchildbearing potential body mass index between 17.530.5 kg/m2 with a total body weight greater than 50kg Evidence or history of any clinically significant physiologic, psychological, or medical conditions a positive drug screen or alcohol breath test a baseline ECG demonstrating a QTc>450msecs or a QRS interval >120msecs
